description: Detects specific process parameters as used by ACTINIUM scheduled task persistence creation. Author: Andreas Hunkeler (@Karneades). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Scheduled Task WScript VBScript
query: (process.command_line:*schtasks* AND process.command_line:*create* AND process.command_line:*wscript* AND process.command_line:*e\:vbscript*)
